sourcesContent:
// src/data/indianDishes.ts

export const indianDishes = [
  {
    id: "paneer-butter-masala",
    title: "Paneer Butter Masala",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1690401767645-595de0e0e5f8?w=600&auto=format&fit=crop&q=60&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8N3x8cGFuZWVyJTIwYnV0dGVyJTIwbWFzYWxhJTIyfGVufDB8fDB8fHwwhttps://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/biryani.jpg",
    price: "₹220",
    quantity: "1 bowl",
    description: "Creamy paneer curry in rich tomato gravy",
    rating: 4.5,
    ingredients: ["Paneer", "Butter", "Tomato", "Cream", "Spices"],
    instructions: [
      "Heat butter and sauté onions.",
      "Add tomatoes and spices.",
      "Blend to make gravy.",
      "Add paneer cubes and cream.",
      "Simmer for 5–10 minutes.",
    ],
  },
  {
    id: "biryani",
    title: "Biryani",
    image: "https://plus.unsplash.com/premium_photo-1694141252774-c937d97641da?w=600&auto=format&fit=crop&q=60&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8MXx8QmlyeWFuaXxlbnwwfHwwfHx8MA%3D%3Dhttps://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/biryani2.jpg",
    price: "₹250",
    quantity: "1 bowl",
    description: "Aromatic rice cooked with vegetables and spices.",
    rating: 4.7,
    ingredients: ["Basmati rice", "Veggies", "Spices", "Curd", "Saffron"],
    instructions: [
      "Cook rice separately.",
      "Prepare vegetable gravy.",
      "Layer rice and gravy.",
      "Add saffron milk.",
      "Dum cook for 20 minutes.",
    ],
  },
   {
    id: "rajma-chawal",
    title: "Rajma Chawal",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1668236534990-73c4ed23043c?w=600&auto=format&fit=crop&q=60&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8UmFqbWElMjBDaGF3YWx8ZW58MHx8MHx8fDA%3D ",
    price: "₹170",
    quantity: "1 plate",
    description: "Red kidney beans curry with steamed rice.",
    rating: 4.6,
    ingredients: ["Rajma", "Onions", "Tomatoes", "Spices", "Rice"],
    instructions: [
      "Soak and boil rajma.",
      "Prepare gravy with spices.",
      "Mix rajma and cook.",
      "Serve with rice.",
    ],
  },
  {
    id: "aloo-paratha",
    title: "Aloo Paratha",
    image: "https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/aloo-paratha.jpg",
    price: "₹120",
    quantity: "2 pieces",
    description: "Stuffed flatbread with spiced mashed potatoes.",
    rating: 4.4,
    ingredients: ["Wheat flour", "Potatoes", "Spices", "Butter"],
    instructions: [
      "Prepare dough.",
      "Make aloo stuffing.",
      "Stuff and roll paratha.",
      "Cook with butter.",
    ],
  },
  {
    id: "chole-bhature",
    title: "Chole Bhature",
    image: "https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/chole-bhature.jpg",
    price: "₹180",
    quantity: "1 plate",
    description: "Spicy chickpea curry with fried bread.",
    rating: 4.7,
    ingredients: ["Chickpeas", "Flour", "Spices", "Yogurt", "Oil"],
    instructions: [
      "Cook chickpeas in masala.",
      "Prepare dough for bhature.",
      "Deep fry and serve hot.",
    ],
  },
  {
    id: "dal-makhani",
    title: "Dal Makhani",
    image: "https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/dal-makhani.jpg",
    price: "₹200",
    quantity: "1 bowl",
    description: "Rich black lentil curry.",
    rating: 4.9,
    ingredients: ["Black lentils", "Cream", "Tomatoes", "Butter", "Spices"],
    instructions: [
      "Soak and boil lentils.",
      "Prepare creamy masala.",
      "Cook slowly for hours.",
    ],
  },
  {
    id: "pav-bhaji",
    title: "Pav Bhaji",
    image: "https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/pav-bhaji.jpg",
    price: "₹150",
    quantity: "1 plate",
    description: "Mixed vegetable curry served with buns.",
    rating: 4.5,
    ingredients: ["Potatoes", "Tomatoes", "Capsicum", "Butter", "Pav buns"],
    instructions: [
      "Cook mashed vegetables.",
      "Add pav bhaji masala.",
      "Serve with buttered pav.",
    ],
  },
  {
    id: "idli-sambar",
    title: "Idli Sambar",
    image: "https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/idli-sambar.jpg",
    price: "₹120",
    quantity: "3 idlis",
    description: "Steamed rice cakes with lentil soup.",
    rating: 4.3,
    ingredients: ["Rice", "Urad dal", "Spices", "Tamarind", "Vegetables"],
    instructions: [
      "Steam idli batter.",
      "Prepare sambar.",
      "Serve hot together.",
    ],
  },
  {
    id: "kadai-paneer",
    title: "Kadai Paneer",
    image: "https://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/kadai-paneer.jpg",
    price: "₹200",
    quantity: "1 bowl",
    description: "Spicy paneer dish with capsicum and onion.",
    rating: 4.6,
    ingredients: ["Paneer", "Capsicum", "Onions", "Tomatoes", "Spices"],
    instructions: [
      "Saute onion and capsicum.",
      "Add paneer and masala.",
      "Cook until done.",
    ],
  }
];
